content.question: An electron of charge <math alttext="lowercase e" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is moving to the right with velocity <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> when it enters the region between a pair of charged parallel plates, as shown in the figure.
